title: Who in NCT has the dirtiest mind? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think many of them have equally dirty minds! But it's just who shows it the most. I would definitely rank Mark, Ten, and Taeyong for the suspicious things that they say all the time. Mark He always laughs at seemingly innocent comments, and there are many video compliations of him laughing at seemingly dirty statements. Some examples are when Mark, said “this is my first time -”, and Johnny had to cut him off by saying his name in a very disapproving manner. Shows that Johnny knows Mark isn't an innocent soul! Or when Johnny and Mark went to make leather wallets together, and Johnny said “we'll be making each other -”, but was cut off by Mark because he thought Johnny said something else (idk, maybe we'll be making out with each other? heh) Mark just laughs at everything tbh. But also dirty stuff. Ten The other answer covered Ten already so I won't talk too much about him, but he's also another one with a terrible mind. Just watch A Cup Of Coffee and you'll know. Taeyong This adorable boy is the person behind so many thirst songs in NCT. I'm pretty sure you know whiplash by now; he says he wants to be whipped more and tamed, and in Baby Don't Like It he raps “I want you to hit and kick me, ruin me”. If that's not TY being a “freaky deaky man” (his lyrics from Mad City), I don't know what is. Honestly, taeyong doesn't really show that he's dirty in ways like Ten and Mark do, but his song lyrics really show what has been on his mind. Definitely not his sister.

ten or mark ten usually says suggestive stuff like when he told johnny he wanted to “have xxxx with [him].” he makes lots of dirty jokes too, like in that v live with taeyong and ten said “i like things that are soft and sticky in my mouth, like our ‘baby don’t stop,’” and in another taeten v live he said he reads webtoon a to learn korean, and when taeyong asks if it’s the weird ones he said “anything’s weird with ten!”. also when he made the “john’s banana” joke, and later during a cup of coffee pt2 they were talking about jaehyun having “tteok (rice cake) skin” and ten said his skin was like honey so they had to taste it. mark laughs at random things he thinks are dick jokes and says “i misunderstood” or “i thought you said something else.” there was a 127 video where taeyong’s asks winwin to describe haechan and he said fox, but mark thought he said f*cks and was laughing his ass off. then mark was in some reality show or something and someone asked “what’s that thing with the two little balls attached” and mark started jumping and laughing. just watch this video Its either dick jokes or about putting dicks into his mouth why pic.twitter.com/X1gswzs1DE— ‎ً (@puku2pang_) December 16, 2018
